reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Supporting refugees through secondary healthcare in Lebanon

description.narrative: Il contributo italiano garantisce l’accesso di circa 5.145 rifugiati ai servizi di assistenza sanitaria mediante il pagamento totale o parziale delle cure secondarie e terziarie erogate da una rete di ospedali convenzionati con UNHCR.

The project will strengthen the resilience of Syrian refugees through an improved access to quality health care services. UNHCR will provide a financial support to refugees in order to fully or partially cover secondary and tertiary health services within a network of contracted hospitals including public health facilities.
